name: Group: View all

queryList.query: Match (g:Group) RETURN g

name: Group: Find all computer sessions of enabled users with privileged group membership

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(u:User {enabled:true})<-[:HasSession]-(c:Computer) WHERE (g1.objectid ENDS WITH $domain_admins OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $enterprise_admins OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $administrators OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $account_operators) RETURN p ORDER BY c.name

name: Group: Find all enabled SVC accounts with privileged group membership

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(u:User {enabled:true})<-[:HasSession]-(c:Computer) WHERE (g1.objectid ENDS WITH $domain_admins OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $enterprise_admins OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $administrators OR g1.objectid ENDS WITH $account_operators) AND u.name CONTAINS 'svc' RETURN p ORDER BY c.name

name: Group: Find all 'Domain Users' Group memberships

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: [DANGEROUS!!!] Route all Group Dangerous Rights to any node type

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer), (u1:User), (g:Group), (gp:GPO), (co:Container), (ou:OU) WITH collect([c, u1, g, gp, co, ou]) AS t WITH t AS results UNWIND results AS results_2 UNWIND results_2 AS result MATCH p=(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword|AdminTo]->(result) RETURN p

name: Group: Route 'Domain Users' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to user node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(u:User) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'Domain Users' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to enabled user node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(u:User {enabled:true}) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'Domain Users' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to group node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(g3:Group) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'Domain Users' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to computer node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(c:Computer) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Find all 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' Group memberships

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: [DANGEROUS!!!] Route 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' Group Dangerous Rights to any node type

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer), (u1:User), (g:Group), (gp:GPO), (co:Container), (ou:OU) WITH collect([c, u1, g, gp, co, ou]) AS t WITH t AS results UNWIND results AS results_2 UNWIND results_2 AS result MATCH p=(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword|AdminTo]->(result) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p  ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to user node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(u:User) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' Group memberships with Dangerous Rights to enabled user node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(u:User {enabled:true}) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to group node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(g3:Group) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: Route 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' group membership grants Dangerous Rights to computer node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(c:Computer) WHERE g1.name STARTS WITH 'AUTHENTICATED USERS' RETURN p ORDER BY g2.name

name: Group: [DANGEROUS!!!] Route all Dangerous Rights from any group to any group node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(g2:Group) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name

name: Group: [DANGEROUS!!!] Route all Dangerous Rights from any group to any user node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(u:User) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name

name: Group: [DANGEROUS!!!] Route all Dangerous Rights from any group to any computer node

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g1:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name

name: Group: Find all groups with description to network shares

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (g:Group {domain:$result}) where (any(prop in keys(g) where g[prop] contains '\\')) return g

name: Group: Find all groups with description to non-SYSVOL network shares

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (g:Group {domain:$result}) where (any(prop in keys(g) where g[prop] contains '\\' and not g[prop] contains 'SYSVOL')) return g

name: Group: List all with 'Local Admin' rights

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(m:Group {domain:$result})-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

name: Group: [NT][TBC] route to AAD:AZGlobalAdmin

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Group) WHERE m.enabled=TRUE WITH m MATCH p=(m)-[:AZGlobalAdmin|AZPrivilegedAdminRole*1..]->(n) RETURN p
